thread.title: Crowne Plaza to open Buckinghamshire property
thread.title_full: Crowne Plaza to open Buckinghamshire property

author: Buying Business Travel
title: Crowne Plaza to open Buckinghamshire property
text:
Crowne Plaza to open Buckinghamshire property 0 comments Follow @thomasnewcombe 
Crowne Plaza is to open a new property in Buckinghamshire following a £20 million renovation of the former Bellhouse Hotel. 
The 138-room four-star Crowne Plaza Gerrards Cross Hotel, located at the base of the Chiltern Hills, will open in autumn this year. 
BMW Group company Designworks has been commissioned to create the concept behind the hotel’s meetings and events space. The 6,500sqm space will feature two large conferences and banqueting suites seating up to 350 and 260 persons respectively, six meeting rooms, a ‘Creative Attic’ and breakout bar. 
The rooms include Espa toiletries and LED smart TVs as well as a restaurant and bar and spa and wellness centre. 
Earlier this year, IHG opened a Crowne Plaza hotel in Berlin.
